chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini has a problem:
The screen has a crack. We sent the request yesterday, but the conversation opened on another article purchased at the same time (case). I would like to be able to talk to someone who could help me decide what to do with my phone.
Thank you

Thank you,

Hi there!

This device does not correspond to the excellent condition, the client accepted the commercial gesture of 60 euros, which is what is stipulated in the Quality Charter.

Just to inform.

Regards
Juan BC Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for notifying us regarding this. If the customer does not require any further assistance, kindly close this conversation. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
